title: SIMBA Module Configuration
description: The schema describes the configuration file provided to the module.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: The mode of execution of the module.

statusFile.title: Status File
statusFile.description: The file in which the return status, updated common, and module data is expected.

lastExecutedTick.title: Last Executed Tick
lastExecutedTick.description: The last executed tick (not provided for mode: start).

lastExecutedTime.title: Last Executed Date Time
lastExecutedTime.description: The last executed date time in ISO format (not provided for mode: start).

currentTime.title: Current Date Time
currentTime.description: The current date time in ISO format.

targetTick.title: Target Tick
targetTick.description: The target tick (not provided for modes: start, end).

targetTime.title: Target Date Time
targetTime.description: The target date time in ISO format (not provided for modes: start, end).

commonData.title: Common Data
commonData.description: Common data provided to all modules upon execution.

moduleData.title: Module specific Data
moduleData.description: Module specific data taken from the module schedule.
